notes: Successive attacks with Stygian Desolator do not stack the debuff, but refresh the duration instead.
The attacks first apply the debuff, then their own damage.
Works against wards, buildings, and allied units.
Replaces the projectile particle of ranged heroes with a red projectile.
Does not stack with the armor reduction of Lesser Corruption. If both debuffs are present, Blight Stone's debuff does not reduce armor.
If both debuffs are present, Blight Stone's debuff does not reduce armor.
Visually alters the wielder's attack projectile. All attack projectile has the following visual priorities: Corruption or Greater Corruption ➤ Cold Attack ➤ Marksmanship procs.
Corruption or Greater Corruption ➤ Cold Attack ➤ Marksmanship procs.
abilities.description: Your attacks reduce the target's armor by 10 for 7 seconds.

additionalInformation: Fully stack with the following: Armor Corruption from talents. Orb of Corrosion and Desolator.
name: Stygian Desolator
description: The original demonic favorite that served as basis for the beloved mortal design.
trivia: Stygian Desolator was the name of Desolator in the original Defense of the Ancients, it was in turn named after an item in Anarchy Online.
